subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Southeast Missouri State women’s basketball team should lose all 79 of its victories during the four-year tenure of the former coach B. J. Smith, an N.C.A.A. committee has ruled. The Committee on Infractions also decided that Southeast should have its 2006 N.C.A.A. tournament appearance taken away, according to a letter released yesterday. The university is appealing the ruling and has asked for a full hearing.
